title: ARNeighborhood
blurb: ARNeighborhood is an Augmented Reality educational tool designed to encourage people to learn about their community.

team.name: Janeen Anderson
team.about: I worked on AR Kit code development.  I integrated text to speech using Watson APIs.

content_html:
Hackathon Requirements

Location: E14 building, 5th floor. Room 514B

The development tools used to build the project

This application utilizes the iOS platform, xCode, Apple ARkit, Mapbox, IBM Watson Text Synthesis API and Unity 3D.

Any assets used in the project

Information courtesy of the Architectural Heritage Foundation and the Boston Landmarks Commission.

Icons: https://icons8.com/license

Any components not created at the hackathon

Photographs courtesy of Fran Gardino.

What it does

ARNeighborhood (pronounced Our Neigborhood) is an Augmented Reality educational tool designed to encourage people to learn about the history of their communities. Our goal is to create a tool that augments the user's experience by giving them an interactive way to learn the unique stories waiting to be discovered right around the corner.

## What it does


ARNeighborhood (pronounced Our Neigborhood) is an Augmented Reality educational
tool designed to encourage people to learn about the history of their communities.
Our goal is to create a tool that augments the user's experience by giving them
an interactive way to learn the unique stories waiting to be discovered
right around the corner.
